content.en: Variational Inclusions: Scientists have been exploring new systems of mathematical problems called variational inclusions. These problems involve finding solutions that satisfy certain conditions. In their research, they have been using algorithms to solve these problems and have been studying the effectiveness of these algorithms in approximating the solutions.
content.da: Variationsinklusioner: Forskere har undersøgt nye systemer af matematiske problemer kaldet variationsinklusioner. Disse problemer indebærer at finde løsninger, der opfylder bestemte betingelser. I deres forskning har de anvendt algoritmer til at løse disse problemer og har studeret effektiviteten af disse algoritmer i at nærme sig løsningerne.
